name: Quirk
overview:
Quirk was founded in February 2010, to facilitate the translation of real-world connections to a rapidly growing number of social networks.

Quirk gives users not only the ability to collect their entire online presence in one profile, but also the power to control what aspects of their online identity to share with new contacts.

Quirks emphasis on connections extends beyond person to person. Social networking has given new life to customer relations. Quirk makes those connections easy, to the benefit of both businesses and consumers.
